<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/collections/{collectionId}"}

</MethodEndpoint>



Get information about an Bohr OGC API feature collection

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
